title: [Gameplay] Project Yi Skin Bug
body: The passive voice for the skin (not joke, taunt, dance, laugh, ability or auto attack) is very quiet and can't be change by the sliders in the option menu for champion voice volume, the lack of voice is really lame as it is one of the best, more so when you pop ulti and the personality just shifts. Much better than just silent game play other then occasional shouting when he alpha strikes.

replies.body: I am getting the same issue. I miss my loud yi voice and ulti :(

Hey TheFat,

Thanks for the report! I'll poke one of our audio bros and see if there's something we can do here.
When they fix it, it would be awesome if you could set the ulti voice to always be on as the ulti is just so short even if you kill the whole team. xD
